properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:39PM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a flood
warning for the following rivers in Ohio...

Portage River At Woodville
Sandusky River Above Fremont
Sandusky River At Tiffin
Huron River Near Milan
Blanchard River Near Findlay
Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
Maumee River At Waterville
Scioto River Near Larue
Scioto River Near Prospect
Eagle Creek Above Findlay

The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Huron River Near Milan
* from Saturday evening to Sunday morning.
* At 8 PM the stage was 12.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday night and rise to
near 18.4 feet by early Sunday morning. The river will fall below
flood stage by Sunday morning.
* At 18.0 feet...Flooding occurs in lying areas along the river from
Milan to Franklin Flats.
properties.instruction:
Never drive your car through flooded roadways. The water may be
deeper than it appears. Turn around...don't drown!

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and other local media for further
details and updates.
